default.title: Google SERP preview visual optimiser | mrozilla
default.description: Click to edit the fields directly to optimise the length of your website's titles and descriptions for Google search snippets visually with hints

error.titleTooShort: Your title is too short, try aiming for ~50 characters in total to [fully utilise the available space](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/35624)
error.titleTooLong: Your title is too long, it's generally smart to stay under 60 characters in total as [Google truncates titles at 600px width (on desktop)](https://moz.com/learn/seo/title-tag)
error.descriptionTooShort: Your description is too short, try aiming for ~100 characters to [provide more information to the users](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/35624)
error.descriptionTooLong: Your description is too long, you generally want to stay under 300 characters in total to avoid [Google truncating your description](https://moz.com/learn/seo/meta-description)
